name: Elephant House Orange Barley
description: Every sip of Elephant House Orange Barley is guaranteed to bring back your fondest memories. Steeped in beautiful, nostalgic feelings of the days gone by, it is the perfect accompaniment to a gathering of friends, family and loved ones. A taste that is enjoyed by all ages, this Orange Barley is widely regarded as a classic, and distinct, Elephant House drink. A timeless tradition, for the ages. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
